players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I was the detective. I investigated Alice and found she is Mafia. Vote Alice to stop the killings."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, Alice is innocent. I think you're the Mafia. Vote Bob."
You: "Bob, I'm not a mafia. Why would you claim I did? I didn't kill Charlie; something else happened. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found she is Mafia. She denies it—she knows I'm detective, so she can't lie. Vote Alice to stop the killings."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob's claim to be detective is suspicious. I think he is the Mafia. Vote Bob to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I was the detective. I investigated Alice and found she is Mafia. Vote Alice to stop the killings."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, Alice is innocent. I think you're the Mafia. Vote Bob."
Alice: "Bob, I'm not a mafia. Why would you claim I did? I didn't kill Charlie; something else happened. Vote Bob."
You: "I investigated Alice and found she is Mafia. She denies it—she knows I'm detective, so she can't lie. Vote Alice to stop the killings."
Alice: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob's claim to be detective is suspicious. I think he is the Mafia. Vote Bob to protect the town."
